title: Pset_ConstructionResource
description: Properties for tracking resource usage over time.

ScheduleWork.title: ScheduleWork
ScheduleWork.description: The scheduled work on behalf of the resource allocation.

ActualWork.title: ActualWork
ActualWork.description: The actual work on behalf of the resource allocation.

RemainingWork.title: RemainingWork
RemainingWork.description: The remaining work on behalf of the resource allocation.

ScheduleCost.title: ScheduleCost
ScheduleCost.description: The budgeted cost on behalf of the resource allocation.

ActualCost.title: ActualCost
ActualCost.description: The actual cost on behalf of the resource allocation.

RemainingCost.title: RemainingCost
RemainingCost.description: The remaining cost on behalf of the resource allocation.

ScheduleCompletion.title: ScheduleCompletion
ScheduleCompletion.description: The scheduled completion percentage of the allocation.

ActualCompletion.title: ActualCompletion
ActualCompletion.description: The actual completion percentage of the allocation.
